Articles.Content:
Hi!

I already know about this tool for editing .mu files and it seems to be functioning fine, but I was wondering if anyone knows about any good tutorials for using it. I know almost nothing about Blender and I'm having a strange phenomenon where my .mu files are doubling in size when I edit them. I'm only importing, changing some float values, and exporting again, so I would not expect this behavior.

Therefore, I am probably doing something wrong during export but I have no idea how to troubleshoot it.
